value:
$WmMPID_年明ベルベット,ch04_32_Velvet_F_NewYear23,Face|Well then, now that we've visited the
shrine, this might be a good chance
to spend some time together.$k$p$WmMPID_年明シャンブレー,ch04_37_Chanbray_M_NewYear23,Face|Wh-what?! I mean, if you want to,
that's fine, but... Should I be worried?$k$p$WmMPID_年明ベルベット,ch04_32_Velvet_F_NewYear23,Face|Could you relax for once? I've heard
Hoshido has a tradition of presenting
gifts to those younger than you.$k$pLike, for example, a little bit of
spending money. Here.$k$p$WmMPID_年明シャンブレー,ch04_37_Chanbray_M_NewYear23,Face|Whoa! Are you giving me all this?
Seriously? All right!$k$p$WmMPID_年明ベルベット,ch04_32_Velvet_F_NewYear23,Face|Yes, but please do not waste it. I trust
you know how to spend this wisely.$k$p$WmMPID_年明シャンブレー,ch04_37_Chanbray_M_NewYear23,Face|Thank you, Mother! I will!$k$pAll right, what should I get with this?
Hehe...$k$p

$WmMPID_年明シャンブレー,ch04_37_Chanbray_M_NewYear23,Face|Umm, Mother...$k$p$WmMPID_年明ベルベット,ch04_32_Velvet_F_NewYear23,Face|What is it, Yarne? Have you decided
how you want to spend that money?$k$p$WmMPID_年明シャンブレー,ch04_37_Chanbray_M_NewYear23,Face|You could say that. Although, you
could also say I kind of...already
spent all of it.$k$p$WmMPID_年明ベルベット,ch04_32_Velvet_F_NewYear23,Face|Already? That was fast. You didn't
waste it, did you?$k$p$WmMPID_年明シャンブレー,ch04_37_Chanbray_M_NewYear23,Face|O-of course not! See?$k$p$WmMPID_年明ベルベット,ch04_32_Velvet_F_NewYear23,Face|A hair accessory... Wait, is this for
me?$k$p$WmMPID_年明シャンブレー,ch04_37_Chanbray_M_NewYear23,Face|There was a stand on the way to the
shrine. To be honest, at first I was
planning to just get it for myself.$k$pBut, as I was looking at it, I realized it
would look really good with your
kimono, and, well... Yeah, it's for you.$k$p$WmMPID_年明ベルベット,ch04_32_Velvet_F_NewYear23,Face|*sigh* I see. Perhaps I should have
told you not to spend it impulsively,
rather than to not waste it.$k$pHowever, thank you. You've made me
very happy.$k$p$WmMPID_年明シャンブレー,ch04_37_Chanbray_M_NewYear23,Face|Hehe... Giving gifts like this is what
parents and children do, right? I'm
glad we can get closer like this.$k$p$WmMPID_年明ベルベット,ch04_32_Velvet_F_NewYear23,Face|So am I. This year is looking to be a
good one.$k$p
